xal.model.elem

Class Collimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.model.elem.Element
      • xal.model.elem.ThinElement
        • xal.model.elem.Collimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IElement

    public class Collimator
extends ThinElement
    This class is used as a location marker in the modeling lattice. Is has no length and no effect on the dynamics of any probe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
